definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Kang/Kang, one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: You may dig a hole with a spade over there.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用铲正在正在边撅个坑。

sentences.english: Yangzikeng watershed began its comprehensive control and exploitation at the beginning of 1992.
sentences.chinese: 杨子坑流域是1992年初开始进行综合治理开发的。

sentences.english: When digging a hole for planting, one should put topsoil and subsoil in two different sides of the hole.
sentences.chinese: 挖栽植坑时，应将表土和底土分别放在坑的两侧。

sentences.english: The background is the Singapore International School in WCH.
sentences.chinese: 背后是黄竹坑的新加坡国际学校。

sentences.english: Using your fingers, make an indentation in the center of each.
sentences.chinese: 用手指在每个球团中央按一个坑。

sentences.english: The downstream reach of Tankeng Hydropower Station is a key protection area of Pelochely bibroni.
sentences.chinese: 滩坑水电站下游为国家一级保护水生动物鼋的保护区。

sentences.english: Their first home is usually a den, which can be a small cave or a hole dug in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 它们的第一个小家是兽穴，即在地上刨出的坑或洞。

sentences.english: It is the eternal mystery, the bottomless pit, the black hole.
sentences.chinese: 黑色是一个永恒的迷，无底坑，黑洞。

sentences.english: However, a pit in the floor of the crater has exposed light-toned, fractured rock.
sentences.chinese: 然而，撞击坑的底部却暴露出浅色，断裂的岩石。

sentences.english: He stepped lightly over the puddle.
Sumps use the weight of water and gravity to help soil's natural percolation.
sentences.chinese: 污水坑使用水和重力的重量，以帮助土的自然渗透。

sentences.english: This route is operated by Wong Chuk Hang Light Bus Services Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 本线由黄竹坑小巴服务有限公司经营。

sentences.english: The third money pit is hypothetical.
Dig a pit and bury the garbage.
It's a pity that we don't have a community hall at WCH to hold such activity.
sentences.chinese: 可惜，我们黄竹坑没有社区会堂可以举类似的活动。

sentences.english: The truck lurched forward ten yards, then foundered.
sentences.chinese: 卡车蹒跚着向前开了十码，便又困在雪坑中。

definition: sequence of movements in martial arts/routine/pattern/standard method
pond/bathhouse pool/dance floor of a ballroom/(old) stalls (front rows in a theater)
carpenter's plane/to plane (woodwork)/to shave off/to peel (with a potato peeler etc)
to dig/to excavate/(coll.) to exclude/not to count/to deduct/to subtract
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
to rock/to sway/to flicker (e.g. of lights reflected on water)/to flutter (e.g. of a flag)/to trick sb into doing sth/to dupe/to con
(Internet slang) to get unjustly ridiculed, attacked, implicated in sth etc while just being present/abbr. for 躺著也中槍|躺着也中枪[tang3 zhe5 ye3 zhong4 qiang1]
(slang) (neologism derived from 背黑鍋|背黑锅[bei1 hei1 guo1]) to carry the can/to be a scapegoat
